authorName.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value: The purpose of this survey was to identify the cooperative  library organizations within the United States and to gather  information about these organizations. In this survey the  Federal/State Cooperative System for Public Library Data collected 32  basic data items and 7 identifying items for each library. The data  items include number of service outlets, full-time equivalent staff,  income, operational expenditures, capital outlay, library collection,  annual public service hours, library services, and inter-library  loans. All 50 states and the District of Columbia are included in this file, which encompasses 8,968 libraries.

topicClassValue.value: ICPSR XVI.A. Social Indicators, United States

fields.value: Version Date: 2006-01-18Version Text: 2006-01-18Version Date: 2006-01-18Version Text: 2006-01-18 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: File SP9596.ALL was removed from any previous datasets and flagged as a study-level file, so that it will accompany all downloads.;Version Date: 2006-01-18Version Text: 2006-01-18 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: File SA9596.ALL was removed from any previous datasets and flagged as a study-level file, so that it will accompany all downloads.;Version Date: 2006-01-18Version Text: 2006-01-18 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: File CB9596.ALL.PDF was removed from any previous datasets and flagged as a study-level file, so that it will accompany all downloads.;Version Date: 2003-07-25Version Text: 2003-07-25 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Users should note that this study is a complete  version of PUBLIC LIBRARIES DATA, 1989: [UNITED STATES] [ICPSR 2212]  with the addition of SAS and SPSS data definition statements. For this  reason, ICPSR 2212 has been permanently removed from the archive.  Also, the variable count for this collection has been corrected to 45,  the record layout for the July 1990 Public Libraries Data Collection  has been removed from the documentation, and the codebook has been converted to PDF.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: LRECL with SAS and SPSS data definition statements;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: (1) One state, Tennessee, supplied only the state  summary data and was unable to provide the individual library data.  (2) The title of this collection has been changed from PUBLIC  LIBRARIES SURVEY, 1989: [UNITED STATES] to PUBLIC LIBRARIES DATA,  1989: [UNITED STATES] to align it with others in the series. (3) The  codebook and data collection instrument are provided by ICPSR as a  Portable Document Format (PDF) file. The PDF file format was developed  by Adobe Systems Incorporated and can be accessed using PDF reader  software, such as the Adobe Acrobat Reader. Information on how to obtain a copy of the Acrobat Reader is provided on the ICPSR Web site.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Data file(s), and electronic documentation.;
